content: What's the closest galaxy to your current location?

As an AI language model, I don't have a physical location, so I don't have a "current location" to determine the closest galaxy. However, if we consider Earth's position, the closest galaxy to us is the Canis Major Dwarf Galaxy, which is approximately 25,000 light-years away. But if you're asking about the closest galaxy in general, it would depend on the location in the universe you're referring to.
